name: OmanaC :C2
storyline: You play as a former champion from the suburbs that won the OmanaC tournament in the city formerly known as West lake city 4 years ago, to pursue an actual career, job and life leaving that all in the past. Little did you know that the game doesn’t end there and find yourself back in the game but for real.
summary: Omanac is a role playing action card game where you collect Omanac cards. These cards are your living weaponry given sentience by using life from your life point pool via a free ratio system. This makes your “entities”functionable battle partners and part of how you play the game. Choosing a combination based on battle type(s) and skills working to defeat other malicious entities as you level up with them.
